name: Prickle Point
description:
TO PLAY: arrows to move, z to snap a photo. Take photos of porcupines to stun them. Take photos of all the porcupines in the map to win!

Welcome to Prickle Point - a national park home to some overly friendly porcupines! Enjoy a scenic walk, take some photos, and avoid quills sent flying your way! This was made for the Secret Santa Jam 2020. Hello to my giftee! :) 

This project is a prototype! There is only a demo level available for now. There are a lot of QOL things I will add in the future (invincibility frames, for one).

Credits: 

Sfx/music from Gruber's free volume 1 and sfx pack

design: paulanu, regumo

programming, art: paulanu
